All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddTeamView
AddTeamView for adding teams
DataHandler
Model part of the system.
DataStorage
Class to save and load to and from file
FootballClub
FootballClub class
FootballClubsFromFile
Class to read football clubs to an array
FrontpageView
FrontpageView shows frontpage
FTApplication
FTApplication main class that extends Application and runs program It shows Start and Quit button on the frontpage and prepares all screens
Group
Class for controlling group play
GroupController
GroupController class that stores football clubs and generates groups.
GroupsView
Shows all generated groups consists of 4 teams
GUIController
GUIController user interactions Controller part of the system //TODO split up into smaller controllers
Main
Main class for starting FTApplication
Match
Creates an instance of a match between two football clubs.
MatchesView
MatchesView class for showing all matches
NoGroupsView
NoGroupsView for situation when no groups are generated.
ScreenController
ScreenController class Has an overview over all panes and can be used to change current pane
TeamsView
TeamsView class Shows all teams
TournamentBracketView
TournamentBracketView class Shows tournament brackets filled with teams where winner shows in bold
TournamentManager
Represents the tournament manager, has methods to generate the knockout matches and list the group matches.
